diagnostic-tools_schema.description: Diagnosis tool, limited to ping and trace.

lb-results.description: List of test result of LB.

lb-result.description: Statistics of test result of LB.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

details.description: List of lb results of all packets in a test.

detail.description: Statistics of lb result of a single packet in a test.

index.description: Serial number of a test packet received by a certain hop.

lt-results.description: List of test result of LT.

lt-result.description: Statistics of test result of LT.

details.description: List of LT results of all packets in a test.

detail.description: Statistics of LT result of a single packet in a test.

hop-index.description: Hop limit of received response packets.

ingress-mac.description: MAC of MIP or MEP configured on the ingress port.

egress-mac.description: MAC of MIP or MEP configured on the egress port.
